name: Raft Adventure
description:
This is Raft Adventure, my first game ever made.

It is a simple, short game where you help guide a raft across a side-scrolling landscape, avoiding obstacles to arrive to the port safely.

My inspiration for this is the many fishing adventures I had as a child with my grandfather, where it would always seem as a challenge to arrive to the port safely.

I plan on updating and adding more levels in hopes of creating a more competitive and fun game.
